name: MPS Graphics
tagline: ERP Solutions for the Graphical Industry.
description:
MPS Graphics is a major provider of ERP Solutions to the graphical industry and our solutions, based on Microsoft Dynamics AX and C5, will fulfil all your requirements for managing your company.
.
Founded in 1993
MPSG has a long history, which gives us the highest experience and industrial knowledge within the area of developing solutions and to advise our customers in the graphical industry.
Certifications

MPSG is Microsoft Silver ISV Partner, and full member of the CIP4 organization.
Partners
We have partners worldwide, who have qualified their staff to work with eGraph through extensive training, and being in the field with our customers.
Installations
Our solutions are successful installed in more than 175 sites.
